structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.text: The provisions of KRS 171.240 to 171.306 shall apply to public libraries as defined in KRS 171.125.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 4, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4618-130f.
